Admin Tools
Manage your Farming Simulator 2022 server easily.
- Set credit limit - Add/Remove money from farms - Open/Close store - Set Store opening/closing hours - Restrict store to selected farms - Enable/Disable vehicle leasing in the store - Enable/Disable vehicle renting for missions - Enable/Disable sleeping - Enable/Disable AI helpers - Enable/Disable missions - Set mission rewards - Set max time speed - Set player running
